root: ^Did you beat those wretched foes in one go? The Slimey one would get its muck all over my crops! Nasty!
^I wanted to run the entire time!

c-1: ^I was scared out of my mind!

keeptalking: ^ I always wanted to put the paws on those grimey things misself. But I never had the courage to stand and face them. I'm simply too weak.
cowardly: ^ I would've bravely fought for the realm! There is no shame in having a bit of fear while your doing  it though.
